name: Lucky Chant
effect: Screen Move. For the next 4 Rounds, if a foe were to target the user or their allies and succeed on a critical or use a guaranteed critical move, it is a regular success while Lucky Chant is Active. Outside of battle good things happen at the story tellers discretion..
description: The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this Pokemon and its allies divine protection.
